rules_text:
When Asham's Path enters, you gain 8 life.
{1}{W}{W}: Transform Asham's Path. Activate only if your fealty to Plains is five or greater.
rules_text2:
Indestructible
Asham, God of Morality's power is equal to your life total.
Creatures you don't control have base power 1.
notes: !append (Each Plains you control counts towards your fealty to Plains.)
